label: Standard
comment: A norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.

datatypeProperties.comment: The identifier of the agency for this referenced standard.
The identifier of the version of a specific element within the referenced standard, such as the version of a data element.
The identifier of this referenced standard.
The identifier of a part of this referenced standard, such as a section or topic.
The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for this referenced standard.
The identifier of the version of this referenced standard.
